// OpenAI æ ¼å¼
private streamOpenAIChunk(res: http.ServerResponse, content: string, model: string): void {
    const chunk = {
        id: `chatcmpl-${Date.now()}`,
        object: 'chat.completion.chunk',
        created: Math.floor(Date.now() / 1000),
        model: model,
        choices: [{
            index: 0,
            delta: { content: content },
            finish_reason: null
        }]
    };
    res.write(`data: ${JSON.stringify(chunk)}\n\n`);
}

// Anthropic æ ¼å¼
private streamAnthropicChunk(res: http.ServerResponse, content: string): void {
    const event = {
        type: 'content_block_delta',
        index: 0,
        delta: { type: 'text_delta', text: content }
    };
    res.write(`event: content_block_delta\n`);
    res.write(`data: ${JSON.stringify(event)}\n\n`);
}

// queue.ts
export class RequestQueue {
    private async executeWithRetry<T>(
        task: () => Promise<T>,
        maxRetries: number
    ): Promise<T> {
        let lastError: Error | null = null;
        
        for (let attempt = 0; attempt <= maxRetries; attempt++) {
            try {
                return await task();
            } catch (error: any) {
                lastError = error;
                
                if (!this.isRetryable(error) || attempt === maxRetries) {
                    throw error;
                }
                
                // æŒ‡æ•°é€€é¿ï¼š1s, 2s, 4s...
                const delay = Math.pow(2, attempt) * 1000;
                await this.sleep(delay);
            }
        }
        
        throw lastError;
    }
    
    private isRetryable(error: Error): boolean {
        const message = error.message.toLowerCase();
        return message.includes('timeout') ||
               message.includes('rate limit') ||
               message.includes('temporarily') ||
               message.includes('overloaded');
    }
}

4. LRU å“åº”ç¼“å­˜

å¯¹äºç¡®å®šæ€§è¯·æ±‚ï¼ˆtemperature=0ï¼‰ï¼Œç¼“å­˜å¯ä»¥æ˜¾è‘—å‡å°‘é‡å¤è°ƒç”¨ï¼š

// cache.ts
export class ResponseCache {
    private cache: Map<string, CacheEntry> = new Map();
    private readonly maxSize = 50 * 1024 * 1024; // 50MB
    private readonly defaultTTL = 5 * 60 * 1000; // 5åˆ†é’Ÿ
    
    generateKey(model: string, messages: any[], options?: any): string {
        const data = JSON.stringify({ model, messages, options });
        return crypto.createHash('sha256').update(data).digest('hex');
    }
    
    get(key: string): string | null {
        const entry = this.cache.get(key);
        if (!entry) return null;
        
        if (Date.now() > entry.expiresAt) {
            this.cache.delete(key);
            return null;
        }
        
        // LRU: ç§»åˆ°æœ«å°¾
        this.cache.delete(key);
        this.cache.set(key, entry);
        
        return entry.response;
    }
}

def remove_overlap(self, prev_text: str, curr_text: str) -> str:
    # æŒ‰æ®µè½åˆ†å‰²
    paragraphs = curr_text.split('\n\n')
    result = []
    
    for para in paragraphs:
        # æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦ä¸å‰æ–‡é‡å¤
        if para.strip() and para.strip() in prev_text:
            continue  # è·³è¿‡é‡å¤æ®µè½
        result.append(para)
    
    return '\n\n'.join(result)

async def translate_document_parallel(self, document_path, target_language):
    # æ§åˆ¶å¹¶å‘æ•°ï¼Œé¿å… API é™æµ
    semaphore = asyncio.Semaphore(max_concurrent)
    
    async def translate_with_limit(chunk_id, chunk_content):
        async with semaphore:
            return await self._translate_single_chunk(chunk_id, chunk_content)
    
    # æ‰€æœ‰ Chunk å¹¶è¡Œç¿»è¯‘
    tasks = [translate_with_limit(i, chunk) for i, chunk in enumerate(chunks)]
    results = await asyncio.gather(*tasks)
    
    return merge_results(results)

class HybridBlogParser:

        # å…ˆå°è¯•æ­£åˆ™è§£æ

        if not scenes and self.use_ai_fallback:

def _call_deepseek_api_with_retry(self, prompt: str, max_retries=3) -> str:
    for attempt in range(max_retries):
        try:
            response = self.client.chat.completions.create(
                model="deepseek-chat",
                messages=[{"role": "user", "content": prompt}],
                temperature=0.1,
                timeout=30
            )
            
            result = response.choices[0].message.content
            # éªŒè¯JSONæ ¼å¼
            json.loads(result)
            return result
            
        except Exception as e:
            if attempt == max_retries - 1:
                raise e
            time.sleep(2 ** attempt)  # æŒ‡æ•°é€€é¿
